body_html: The binary distribution of tensorflow-gpu, which is provided through pip, is compiled with little support of advanced features of main stream cpu for maximum compatibiliy. So in order to use these features, you have to download the source from github and compile it youself following the steps illustrated by the official site of tensorflow. That's all.
body_text: The binary distribution of tensorflow-gpu, which is provided through pip, is compiled with little support of advanced features of main stream cpu for maximum compatibiliy. So in order to use these features, you have to download the source from github and compile it youself following the steps illustrated by the official site of tensorflow. That's all.
body: The binary distribution of tensorflow-gpu, which is provided through pip, is compiled with little support of advanced features of main stream cpu for maximum compatibiliy. So in order to use these features, you have to download the source from github and compile it youself following the steps illustrated by the official site of tensorflow. That's all.
